name: Guy in the chair (Por Que)
description:
Play as typical "guy in the chair" in a heist movie. Hack and lead ur partner.

Use keyboard to hack and arrows to guide ur partner.

------------
Game created for MageJamV4 - 48h game jam, topic "Entire game on one screen"

Created by

Damian Klabuhn

Krzysztof Maliński

Adam Koliński

Mikołaj Mikołajczak
